gen:link.msg:message: Reported value of `Equity` at end of period SHOULD be equal to sum of reported value of `Equity` at beginning of period and changes in that value during period, `EquityMovement`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesEducation_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_EquityEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesEducation_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_EquityEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesEducation_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_EquityStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesEducation_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_EquityStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesEducation_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_EquityMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesEducation_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_EquityMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`EquityMember` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying children members. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesEducation_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesEducation_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesEducation_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesEducation_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`EquityMember` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying children members. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesEducation_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesEducation_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesEducation_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesEducation_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`EquityMovement` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_EquityMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_EquityMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfEquityMovementCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfEquityMovementCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfEquityMovementDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfEquityMovementDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`Equity` reported with `ClassesOfEquityAxis` and `DesignatedFundPrivateMember` MUST be equal to `DesignatedFundPrivate` without `ClassesOfEquityAxis` and DesignatedFundPrivateMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit5_Set02ClassesOfEquityAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit5_Set02ClassesOfEquityAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit5_Set01ClassesOfEquityAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit5_Set01ClassesOfEquityAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`Equity` reported with `ClassesOfEquityAxis` and `DesignatedFundPublicMember` MUST be equal to `DesignatedFundPublic` without `ClassesOfEquityAxis` and DesignatedFundPublicMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit4_Set02ClassesOfEquityAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit4_Set02ClassesOfEquityAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit4_Set01ClassesOfEquityAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit4_Set01ClassesOfEquityAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`Equity` reported with `ClassesOfEquityAxis` and `DesignatedReservePrivateMember` MUST be equal to `DesignatedReservePrivate` without `ClassesOfEquityAxis` and DesignatedReservePrivateMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit3_Set02ClassesOfEquityAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit3_Set02ClassesOfEquityAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit3_Set01ClassesOfEquityAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit3_Set01ClassesOfEquityAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`Equity` reported with `ClassesOfEquityAxis` and `DesignatedReservePublicMember` MUST be equal to `DesignatedReservePublic` without `ClassesOfEquityAxis` and DesignatedReservePublicMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit2_Set02ClassesOfEquityAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit2_Set02ClassesOfEquityAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit2_Set01ClassesOfEquityAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit2_Set01ClassesOfEquityAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`Equity` reported with `ClassesOfEquityAxis` and `EquityMember` MUST be equal to `Equity` without `ClassesOfEquityAxis` and EquityMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit11_Set02ClassesOfEquityAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit11_Set02ClassesOfEquityAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit11_Set01ClassesOfEquityAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit11_Set01ClassesOfEquityAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`Equity` reported with `ClassesOfEquityAxis` and `GeneralReserveMember` MUST be equal to `GeneralReserve` without `ClassesOfEquityAxis` and GeneralReserveMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set02ClassesOfEquityAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set02ClassesOfEquityAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set01ClassesOfEquityAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesEducation_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set01ClassesOfEquityAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
